krushikarma departhamenthuwa magin danata deshiya ala gowiyage gowipalata gos ala kilo ekak rupiyal 65/- sita 70/- dakwa mila gananwalata miladi ganimata thiranaya kara athi bawath, mema sakachchawedi deshiya ala gowiyata abhiyogayakda idiripath wu bawa pawasana nuwaraeliya disa lekamwaraya danata ala gowiya raka ganimata aanayanaya karana arthapal kilo ekakata rupiyal 10/- ka baddak panawa athi bawath, labana wasare sita deshiya ala awashyathawa sapura dimata ala gowiya piyawara gatha yuthu bawath kiweya.
